title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: STAR Framework Mastery for Mathematics Majors' Employment Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can construct five or more STAR-formatted case studies based on real-world math project experiences.
Learners can respond to mock interviews with 80% or higher accuracy using the Situation-Task-Action-Result (STAR) structure.
Learners can maintain competency articulation skills improved by 20% or more compared to the control group in a 6-month follow-up evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
